snippet: Novak Djokovic continued his recent mastery of Rafael Nadal on hard courts, winning 7-6 (5), 6-2 on his sixth match point Saturday to reach the BNP Paribas Open final for the third straight year....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic continued his recent mastery of Rafael Nadal on hard courts, winning 7-6 (5), 6-2 on his sixth match point Saturday to reach the BNP Paribas Open final for the third straight year.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Beats Nadal to Reach Indian Wells Final
headline.main: Djokovic Beats Nadal to Reach Indian Wells Final
